channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Snow and ice ground flights and choke highways in parts of Europe

item.title: 2 killed in shooting outside Mormon church in Salt Lake City

item.title: A Supreme Court ruling could bring historic drop in Black representation in Congress
item.description: If the Supreme Court weakens Voting Rights Act protections against racial discrimination in redistricting, it could usher in the largest-ever drop in ...

item.title: Cambodia extradites alleged scam mastermind to China after arrest
item.description: Chen Zhi is charged with turning his business into a front for fraud hubs that stole from people around the world.

item.title: One million without heat and water after Russian strikes, Ukraine says
item.description: Efforts are continuing to restore services in Dnipropetrovsk, officials say, after wide-spread attacks in the southeast.
